title: Skin Boost Missing in Aram
body: I was playing aram today and noticed there was no skin boost option and it wasnt in patch notes

replies.body: As DarkRitual had mentioned, they're currently disabled. You can keep track of this, and other service statuses [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
I was wondering why y'all changed it to "Battle Boost" from "Skin Boost".

> [{quoted}](name=rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=sdsiAgBI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-29T01:33:59.582+0000)
>
> I was wondering why y'all changed it to "Battle Boost" from "Skin Boost".

Not sure. My guess is, it's a cooler name. :P
It's listed as Temporarily Disabled on the Service Status Page, as of 1:09 AM
